page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT - STRANRAER
page.content: Stranraer is very limited in the entertainment field. There are no theatres, cinemas or dance halls. The nearest cinema is{26 miles away}in Newton Stewart. There is an Operatic and Dramatic Society in the town who produce and perform shows at regular intervals for the public. All these shows are held in the main halls at Stranraer Academy.{Travelling dramatic shows tour the district through out the year. There are no night clubs or special dance halls in the town. However, dancing and music can be enjoyed in most of the local pubs and hotels. There are several popular local bands and discos in the town. { Bus parties}take theatre lovers to shows in{Ayr}and{Glasgow.
